languages.text: Лорд-инквизитор должен пребывать в своем штабе на Футфоле, во дворце Наместника. Там Вольный Торговец сможет потребовать ответа на свои вопросы.
The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.
languages.original_text: Лорд-инквизитор должен пребывать в своем штабе на Футфоле, во дворце Наместника. Там Вольный Торговец сможет потребовать ответа на свои вопросы.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.
The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.
The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.
The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur devrait se trouver dans le palais du suzerain, son quartier général à Castel. Une fois sur place, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} exigera des réponses à toutes ses questions.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur devrait se trouver dans le palais du suzerain, son quartier général à Castel. Une fois sur place, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} exigera des réponses à toutes ses questions.

languages.text: 大审判官应该就在他的总部，落脚港总督的宫殿之中。在那里，行商浪人可以要求大审判官回答{mf|他|她}的所有问题。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.

traits.locale_text: 审判长应该就在他的总部，落脚港总督的宫殿之中。在那里，行商浪人可以要求审判长回答{mf|他|她}的所有问题。

languages.text: ロード・インクィジターはフットフォールの本部、領主の宮殿にいるはずだ。そこで自由開拓者は、自身の質問にすべて応えるよう要求するつもりだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.

traits.locale_text: ロード・インクィジターはフットフォールの本部、領主の宮殿にいるはずだ。そこで自由開拓者は、自身の質問にすべて応えるよう要求するつもりだ。

languages.text: Der Großinquisitor sollte in seinem Hauptquartier auf Footfall sein, im Palast des Lehnsherren. Dort wird {mf|der Freihändler Antworten auf all seine|die Freihändlerin Antworten auf all ihre} Fragen einfordern.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.

traits.locale_text: Der Großinquisitor sollte in seinem Hauptquartier auf Footfall sein, im Palast des Lehnsherren. Dort wird {mf|der Freihändler Antworten auf all seine|die Freihändlerin Antworten auf all ihre} Fragen einfordern.

languages.text: El Lord Inquisidor debería estar en su cuartel general en Paso, en el palacio del Señor. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería buscar allí las respuestas a sus preguntas.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.

traits.locale_text: El Lord Inquisidor debería estar en su cuartel general en Paso, en el palacio del Señor. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería buscar allí las respuestas a sus preguntas.

languages.text: Lord Engizisyoncu, Binliman'da Emîr'in Sarayı'ndaki karargâhında olmalı. Hür Tacir, burada tüm sorularına cevap arayacak.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor should be at his headquarters on Footfall, at the Liege's palace. There, the Rogue Trader will demand answers to all {mf|his|her} questions.
